job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Tesla is looking for a strong Software Engineer to design and develop software for its current and next generations of Business Systems Applications. This position will be working with the Software Engineering team in Fremont, CA.  The team will build the system used to supply material to the distribution and service centers. It will be built with the long-term vision of being a global system to manage warehouses for all Tesla business operations, which includes Vehicle Service and Energy Products. This will be a business-critical system essential to support the growth and mission of Tesla. The candidate will be working in Go, Angular, React, and MySQL.
